mapper.select:
select p.pharmacyId,p.pharmacyName,p.drugstoreId rugstoreId,p.skullId,p.warehouseId,p.unit unitId,p.sellingPrice, p.area areaId,p.type typeId,p.produceDate,p.validDate,p.drugstorenum,p.skullbatch,u.unitName,a.areaName,t.typeName from pharmacy p,unit u,area a,type t
p.unit=u.unitId and p.area=a.areaId and p.type=t.typeId
and p.pharmacyName like concat('%',concat(#{pharmacyName},'%'))
and p.pharmacyId=#{pharmacyId}
select hospitalpriceid,registerId registerid,durgname,durgnum,repiceprice,repicetotal,htime,state from hospitalprice where state=#{state} and registerId=#{registerid} order by htime desc
mapper.update: update hospitalprice set durgnum=durgnum+#{durgnum},repicetotal=durgnum*repiceprice,htime=NOW() where registerId=#{registerid} and state=#{state} and durgname=#{durgname}
update pharmacy set drugstorenum=drugstorenum+#{durgnum} where pharmacyName=#{durgname};
update pharmacy set drugstorenum=drugstorenum-#{durgnum} where pharmacyName=#{durgname};
update hospitalprice set state=2,htime=NOW() where state=0 and registerId=#{registerid}
